categories.title: Recent Updates and Fixes in ElizaOS and GOAT Plugin

content.text: The ElizaOS project has recently stabilized its development branch, ensuring a more robust and reliable codebase.
An update has been made to the ElizaOS project to correct the Discord link, ensuring users can easily connect with the community.

A bug fix has been implemented in the ElizaOS project to enhance the functionality of generating structured objects and images using the NEAR AI model. This fix addresses issues with unsupported models and improves the integration of NEAR AI for object and image generation.

The Hyperlane GOAT Plugin has been updated to include Hyperlane action handlers, enhancing the plugin's capabilities. This update involves sending and reading Hyperlane messages and conducting test transfers between different blockchain chains.
ElizaOS v0.25.8 has been released, featuring a significant change where all plugins have been moved out of the main repository. This update aims to massively reduce the bloat on the repository.
The new release of the ElizaOS Framework involves moving out the plugins, which is a major update for users. This change is expected to streamline the framework and improve its efficiency.
The ElizaOS project recently merged a pull request to update the Discord link. This update was part of a series of improvements made by the development team.
The development team focused on fixing one bug, with contributions from three developers who merged a total of three pull requests. These efforts were part of ongoing improvements to the project.
@0xCE7E5 expresses frustration that 'tpot' is unrelated to teapots or tea.
A user comments 'What a world' alongside a shared image.

categories.title: Agent Scarlett's Pitch on Clank Tank

content.text: Agent Scarlett impressed the judges, including Degen, with her pitch on Clank Tank. Her presentation was well-received, leading to her success in the competition.
